attributes.contentHtml:
Starwatcher was actually originally developed by a team of developers in which he contributed nothing, then claimed it was his code although he did apologize for doing that. A few weeks after the initial release of Starwatcher his original Discord account was banned though I don't remember if he said what for.

ItsGamingTube was originally banned from WinterHoax for being a minor / not complying with both Drama (WinterHoax)'s TOS and Discord's

attributes.bio: my cover is a cars meme I found on facebook

attributes.title: ItsGamingTube: The rise and fall of a skid

attributes.contentHtml: Tomas Thank you for the info, I didn’t know about some of this. I’m was talking about the current StarWatcher, the one he is hosting.
